meanings.definition: A surname of German origin. Also, the name of a town in Garrett County, Maryland, USA. Most notably associated with Kitzmiller v. Dover Area School District, a 2005 court case regarding the teaching of intelligent design in public schools.
meanings.english_definition: A surname of German origin. Also, the name of a town in Garrett County, Maryland, USA. Most notably associated with Kitzmiller v. Dover Area School District, a 2005 court case regarding the teaching of intelligent design in public schools.

examples.sentence: The Kitzmiller case was a landmark legal battle.
examples.translation: キッツミラー事件は画期的な法的闘争でした。
